channel.title: Server ::update doesn't work!

item.title: Server ::update doesn't work!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“J for jawsh, post:1, topic:410771”]Hey…for some reason ::update doesn’t work…I type it an it does nothing, I checked the code and it looks fine I guess. I’m not a coder, I just know how to look through a client.java note pad >.>

Here’s the code…

[code]{

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("update") && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Defence")) {
			String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
			int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
			PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = 30;
			PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = true;
			PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
			PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
		}[/code][/quote]

Are you including an integer after you type ::update? (ie. "::update ")

Read full topic
